title: Armadillo Tamarillo: A Berry and Sophie Book
description: Have fun and be amazed with Sophie and Berry, as they take on a challenge to make up a fun new snap-song! See how fast y ou can say it too! Berry and Sophie are best friends who live next door to each other. They love fluffy animals, sparkles, lots of fun, and words that rhyme like strawberry and being merry. One day they discover an idea for a writing a new snap-song, so they put their hope in God and ask Him for help! They begin creating a song, but little did they know it would be so much fun for their friends to sing and dance to as well. Join Berry and Sophie for lots of fun, going to an Animal Park to see some amazing animals, snappy songs about delicious food and more...!
author: Katie Katay
